space.save_graph_description: You need to select a password to prevent your network to be edited by other people, and an email address in case you forget the password.

upload.error_uploading_file: An error occured while uploading the file
upload.invalid_JSON_file: The JSON file is not valid.
upload.invalid_GEXF_file: The GEXF file is not valid.
upload.invalid_file_format: The file format is not recognized yet.

force.linlog_description: Different equations with slower convergence but more clustering. Avoid if disconnected components or nodes.
force.gravity_description: Attracts all nodes to the center, preventing disconnected components to drift away
force.stronger_gravity_description: Another gravity equation that keeps nodes in a close circle
force.no_overlapping_description:
When the layout is converged, prevents node to overlap
Note: If you do this too early, the network might get entangled

nodesize.title: Node size
nodesize.description: The layout is usually cleaner when most connected nodes are bigger. The degree is the number of links, the indegree (outdegree) is the number of inbound links (outbound).

narratives.default_slide_text: Write the content of your slide here...

errors.unauthorized: Unauthorized logon failed due to server configuration.
